```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(fastDummies)
```

```{r}
data <- readr::read_csv(file = "data/car_accidents/accidents.csv")
data %>% head()
```


```{r}
model <- lm(deaths ~ . - county - pop_per_100k, data=data)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```
